name: Alien B.C.
description:
DOMINATE THE ANCIENT WORLD WITH ALIEN TECHNOLOGY

You are in control of the Alien Domination in the Ancient World - BC (Before Clickers). Click to Dominate and gain power over storage facilities, communication centers, and power stations. You can also hire Alien Overseers, Druids, and Atlanteans to dominate much faster.

BTW - This is my first game. My very first game, from scratch, made for Ludum Dare 36.

DOMINATE!
